text: Nagri kasnampa vahe'ene, nagri kema erino vu vahe'mo'zama henkama fore hania zanku'ma huama'ma hu'naza zantamina, Nagra ana zantamina erifore nehua Anumza mani'noe. E'ina hu'negu menina amanage nehue, Jerusalemi rankumapina mani avinete'za, Juda mopafima me'nea kumatmina negi'za havizama hu'nea kumatamina nagra hanuge'za ete erioti vagare'za kigahaze.
